dcterms:description: PartNet-Mobility is a dataset designed for 3D part segmentation, containing 45 object categories with a total of 1,906 objects, where each category has a training split of 8 shapes and a test split ranging from 6 to 338 objects.
dcterms:title: PartNet-Mobility

dcterms:description: GLIP is a model for grounded language-image pre-training, which is utilized for obtaining 2D segmentation masks in multi-view images to enhance 3D segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: GLIP

dcterms:creator: Alexander Kirillov
Eric Mintun
Nikhila Ravi

Wan-Yen Lo
dcterms:description: SAM is a segmentation model that takes a bounding box as input and produces a foreground mask, which is integrated into the 3D segmentation pipeline to improve boundary accuracy.
dcterms:title: SAM

dcterms:creator: Minghua Liu
Yinhao Zhu
Hong Cai
Shizhong Han
Zhan Ling
Fatih Porikli
Hao Su
dcterms:description: PartSLIP is a method for low-shot part segmentation for 3D point clouds that utilizes pretrained image-language models to achieve results comparable to fully supervised methods.
dcterms:title: PartSLIP
